title: The Gospel of Jesus
itunes:title: The Gospel of Jesus
description: In the very first line of his Gospel, St. Mark tells us that he is going to share with us Good News, Glad Tidings, about Jesus, the Son of God. In many ways, the rest of the text is but a playing out of the implications of that statement. In this homily, I explore the meaning of the phrase "Good News" in connection with Jesus.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
